description:
The Khronos Group has unveiled Vulkan 1.4, an update to its cross-platform 3D graphics and compute API that mandates support for numerous previously optional features. The latest version integrates several proven capabilities into its core specification, marking a shift towards ensuring consistent functionality across different platforms whilst simplifying application development and deployment. Geraint North, VP... Read more »

The post Vulkan 1.4: Khronos mandates key graphics features appeared first on Developer Tech News.
title: Vulkan 1.4: Khronos mandates key graphics features
